original_text: But you will not have to hurry and run away. No, the Lord, Israel's God, will keep you safe. He will lead you at the front, and he will be your guard at the back. The Lord's Servant But you will not have to hurry and run away.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희 앞에서 행하시며 이스라엘의 하나님이 너희 뒤에서 호위하시리니 너희가 황급히 나오지 아니하며 도망하듯 다니지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: But you will not have to hurry
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 서두를 필요가 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will lead you at the front
and he will be your guard at the back
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 뒤에서 당신의 수호자가 되실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But you will not have to hurry
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 서두를 필요가 없을 것입니다
